TopicTitle: Some additional MK2 Space plane parts

Articles.Content:
First off, porkjets space plane parts are great! and ive been having a great time building stuff.

while I've been building, I have noticed there are some parts I would really like to have to complete the set.

MK2 Nosecone Cargo Door. A hollow nose cone that opens up to release a small payload or could be combined with the other cargo bays to house a larger payload. you could also just put a docking port,an engine or just ballast in there.

+Retractable Loading ramp to complement Nose cone cargo doors. should be similar dimensions to Telus-LV Bay Mobility Enhancer (the long ladder) but a ramp (with collision). for driving vehicles in and out of cargo bays.

MK2 decoupler. not much more to say. its a decoupler that fits inline with MK2 part set.

MK2 Bulkhead. basically just a simple flat endcap, roughly the size of the MK2 size probe core, to go on the end of your cargo bay. this could also be used as a spacer and maybe it could also be a battery or reaction wheel?

+MK2 to 2.5m adapter. pretty self explanatory.

+Heavier Landing gear. A larger landing gear with two or four wheels. and adjustable height.

all these would be useful in the up coming revamped MK3 part set too.

please feel free to suggest any additional parts.

added more parts to list.

I'm with ya, bro.

You know what else? All the stuff we have for Mk2 size now + these 3 suggestions in Mk3 size. The Mk3 is never used and just a waste of computer memory. If they made it more useful I'd play with it 24/7!
A Mk2->2.5m adapter would be nice, too.
